sentence: “I’ve gone to battle with Big Tech,” Mehmet Oz, the physician and TV personality, said when announcing his Senate campaign in December.
author: Zach Everson
title: Dr. Oz Wants To Fight Big Tech In The Senate. He Owns At Least $10 Million In Shares Of Alphabet, Amazon, Apple And Microsoft.

author: Alex Hammer & Jonathan Rose
title: Now Elon Musk asks if 'w' should be deleted from Twitter - without no as an answer - in latest poll hours after holding vote on if social media giant's HQ should become a homeless shelter because 'no one turns up anyway'

author: Alex Hammer
title: World's richest man Elon Musk mocks Washington Post op-ed calling to prevent the wealthy from controlling media platforms after the Tesla CEO bought 9% stake in Twitter

author: Chris Donaldson
title: ‘Is Twitter dying?’ Elon Musk names names of large follower accounts not active; proposes key changes

sentence: Host Alex Marlow breaks down the latest news, including President Trump’s endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz, Elon Musk backing off Twitter’s board, the latest trans hysteria, the chaos at our border, France’s presidential election, and Big Joey’s latest effort to dis-unify the country.
author: Breitbart News
title: Breitbart News Daily Podcast Ep. 111: Trump Endorses Dr. Oz, Musk Off Twitter Board; Guest: David Mamet

sentence: One of the biggest races in the upcoming midterm election has gotten a little more interesting as former president Trump endorsed the celebrity medical personality Mehmet Oz in the Republican primary for the Pennsylvania senate seat.
author: Sean P. Cooper
title: What Happened Today: April 14, 2022
